en-US.summary: Guess a three digit number, and Alexa will give you hints about what digits are correct.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask basic bagels game is it {number}
en-US.name: Basic bagels Game
en-US.description: Guess a number, and Alexa will tell you Pico if one digit is correct, but in the wrong place, Fermi if one digit is in the correct place, or bagels if no digit is correct.  She will also tell you how many times you have played.
